caption.p: Confocal microscopy images of NSCs infected with ZIKV ( A), WNV ( B) and DENV-2 ( C), MOI 1, 72 hpi. Flavivirus E glycoprotein was stained with goat anti-mouse IgG H&L FITC-conjugated (green); the NSCs marker PAX6 was stained with goat anti-rabbit IgG AlexaFluor546-conjugated (red). Merged images, 60Ã— magnification, zoomed two times.
